entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Ensure all UsingNode overloads verify diagnostics #60915
    Compiler.Next
  • Visual Studio should take global using directives (e.g. ImplicitUsings) into account when creating new C# files #60912
  • Intellisense Method Paramter list to wrap not truncate #60911
  • NullReferenceException in PdbSourceDocumentLoaderService.cs line 130 #60908
  • Invalid IL produced for an unused struct load from a `ref` local #60905
    Compiler.Next
  • CA1822 "Make static" code fix does not respect csharp_preferred_modifier_order #60903
  • IDE0060 should not activate when a base member is hidden with `new` #60902
  • Feature request: propagate [UnconditionalSuppressMessage] to compiler-generated methods in the nested lexical scope #60898
    C# 11.0

Closed

  • VSIX deployment fails with IOException #60031
    17.2
  • Add Ability to Embed netmodules #60503
  • Test plan for "auto-default structs" #60167
    17.3

PullRequests

Created

  • Use dotnet bot instead of vslsnap for insertions #60917
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge main into features/ref-fields #60914
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Unify nint and IntPtr #60913
    Area-Compilers
  • Record read of ref local even if value is discarded #60910
    Area-Compilers
  • Bump RichNav timeout to 260 min #60909
    Area-Infrastructure, Community
  • Change VS insertions to use dotnet-bot account #60907
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add FixAll support for code refactorings (approach #2) #60906
    Area-Analyzers
  • Optimize allocations in batch queue processing #60901
    Area-IDE
  • Store incremental data in AVL tree instead of array #60900
    Area-IDE
  • Correctly set the TemplateSelector of inheritance margin. #60899
    Area-IDE, UX Review Not Required

Merged

  • Fix CI in main #60916
    Area-Compilers, Test, Next
  • Fill out test plan for auto-default structs #60688
    Area-IDE, Area-Compilers, Next
  • [LSP] Implement support for `workspace/semanticTokens/refresh` notifications #60824
    Area-IDE, LSP, Next
  • Verify conversion kinds in native int conversion tests #60895
    Area-Compilers, Test
  • Respect test requests to expedite processing in solution crawler. #60886
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #60897
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Support ref field declarations from source and metadata #60416
    Area-Compilers
  • Remaining fallback options #60888
    Area-IDE
  • Implement source generator timing APIs #60267
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators
  • API for exposing imports (including global imports) from the semantic model #59533
    Area-Compilers, api-approved
  • File modifier parsing #60823
    Area-Compilers
  • Handle unexpected keyword rather than identifier for lambda parameter name #60825
    Area-Compilers
  • [semi-auto-props]: Support assigning properties from constructor #60601
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Handle cases where 'field' keyword shouldn't generate a field #60806
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Add IDE tests for nameof(parameter) and mitigation for speculation issue #60802
    Area-IDE, Area-Compilers
  • Add feature to show users what global-usings are in scope at the top of a file. #60893
    Area-IDE
